_header: In sorry time my life is I-spent
_description: The woebegone lover — six lines (possibly incomplete)

PROSC217541.Transcription:
In sory tyme my lyf is yspent& euer so lengar more &
                    more& ȝut wel more but hyt amendy may not liue y nam but
                    lorehure loue to lenun & y ne mayfor sykurlyche y wot hyt
                    wel…
PROSC217541.Editions:
Stanley,  Eric Gerald. 
             “An Inedited Scrap of Middle English Verse from the West
                Midlands.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         60 (1959): 287-8: 287.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 47.
